title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Elementary Mathematics Problem-Solving via Personal Learning Environments (PLE)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed math problem-solving plans at least twice weekly via PLE (Personal Learning Environment) setup
Learners can propose at least three alternative solution strategies for complex math problems (two-step reasoning problems) using peer feedback systems
Learners can systematically document the problem-solving process for descriptive math questions by integrating physical/digital classroom resources (wall graphs, mobile apps)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
